sourcesContent:
Gift Shopping Cart

ID
{{ giftShoppingCart.id }}
Date
{{ giftShoppingCart.date | formatMediumDatetime }}
Amount
{{ giftShoppingCart.amount }}
User
{{ giftShoppingCart.user?.id }}
Gift
{{ giftShoppingCart.gift?.id }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IGiftShoppingCart } from '../gift-shopping-cart.model'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-gift-shopping-cart-detail', templateUrl: './gift-shopping-cart-detail.component.html', }) export class GiftShoppingCartDetailComponent implements OnInit { giftShoppingCart: IGiftShoppingCart | null = null; constructor(protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ giftShoppingCart }) => { this.giftShoppingCart = giftShoppingCart; }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
